languages.text: До самого выхода из варпа команда была охвачена ужасом: каждую установочную ночь неизвестная тварь забирает в небытие несколько десятков людей — порой на совершенно разных палубах. Команда подавлена гибелью друзей и родных, молельни корабля переполнены.

The crew remained in the grasp of terror until the vessel finally left the warp. Each night the lurking beast would claim the lives of several dozen people, sometimes from entirely different decks. The crew is distressed by the loss of their friends and relatives and the ship's prayer rooms are overcrowded.
languages.original_text: До самого выхода из варпа команда была охвачена ужасом: каждую установочную ночь неизвестная тварь забирает в небытие несколько десятков людей — порой на совершенно разных палубах. Команда подавлена гибелью друзей и родных, молельни корабля переполнены.

Each night the lurking beast would claim the lives of several dozen people, sometimes from entirely different decks. The crew is distressed by the loss of their friends and relatives and the ship's prayer rooms are overcrowded.

The crew remained in the grasp of terror until the vessel finally left the warp. Each night the lurking beast would claim the lives of several dozen people, sometimes from entirely different decks. The crew is distressed by the loss of their friends and relatives and the ship's prayer rooms are overcrowded.

languages.text: 直到舰船驶出亚空间之前，船员们都一直处于恐惧之中。每天晚上，那头潜伏的野兽都会夺走几十个人的性命，有时甚至会在多个甲板中肆虐。船员们失去了朋友与亲人，无比痛苦，船上的祈祷室人满为患。
languages.original_text: The crew remained in the grasp of terror until the vessel finally left the warp. Each night the lurking beast would claim the lives of several dozen people, sometimes from entirely different decks. The crew is distressed by the loss of their friends and relatives and the ship's prayer rooms are overcrowded.

traits.locale_text: 直到舰船驶出亚空间之前，船员们都一直处于恐惧之中。每天晚上，那头潜伏的野兽都会夺走几十个人的性命，有时甚至会在多个甲板中肆虐。船员们失去了朋友与亲人，无比痛苦，船上的祈祷室人满为患。

languages.text: La tripulación continuó presa del terror hasta que la nave abandonó finalmente la disformidad. Cada noche, la bestia acechante se cobraba la vida de varias decenas de personas, a veces desde cubiertas completamente distintas. La tripulación está angustiada por la pérdida de sus amigos y familiares y las salas de oración de la nave están abarrotadas.
languages.original_text: The crew remained in the grasp of terror until the vessel finally left the warp. Each night the lurking beast would claim the lives of several dozen people, sometimes from entirely different decks. The crew is distressed by the loss of their friends and relatives and the ship's prayer rooms are overcrowded.

traits.locale_text: La tripulación continuó presa del terror hasta que la nave abandonó finalmente la disformidad. Cada noche, la bestia acechante se cobraba la vida de varias decenas de personas, a veces desde cubiertas completamente distintas. La tripulación está angustiada por la pérdida de sus amigos y familiares y las salas de oración de la nave están abarrotadas.

languages.text: クルーは、船がやっと<歪み>を切り抜けるまで、ずっと恐怖の中にいた。身を潜める獣が毎夜、時には全く別のデッキから現れて、何十人もの命を奪うこともある。クルーはいなくなる友人や家族の存在に悩み、船の礼拝室は混雑している。
languages.original_text: The crew remained in the grasp of terror until the vessel finally left the warp. Each night the lurking beast would claim the lives of several dozen people, sometimes from entirely different decks. The crew is distressed by the loss of their friends and relatives and the ship's prayer rooms are overcrowded.

traits.locale_text: クルーは、船がやっと<歪み>を切り抜けるまで、ずっと恐怖の中にいた。身を潜める獣が毎夜、時には全く別のデッキから現れて、何十人もの命を奪うこともある。クルーはいなくなる友人や家族の存在に悩み、船の礼拝室は混雑している。

languages.text: Tout l'équipage vit depuis dans la terreur la plus totale en attendant la sortie du Warp. Chaque nuit, la monstruosité prend la vie de plusieurs dizaines de personnes, parfois à des endroits très éloignés les uns des autres. Les membres d'équipage ont perdu beaucoup d'amis et de proches et les salles de prière du vaisseau ne désemplissent pas.
languages.original_text: The crew remained in the grasp of terror until the vessel finally left the warp. Each night the lurking beast would claim the lives of several dozen people, sometimes from entirely different decks. The crew is distressed by the loss of their friends and relatives and the ship's prayer rooms are overcrowded.

traits.locale_text: Tout l'équipage vit depuis dans la terreur la plus totale en attendant la sortie du Warp. Chaque nuit, la monstruosité prend la vie de plusieurs dizaines de personnes, parfois à des endroits très éloignés les uns des autres. Les membres d'équipage ont perdu beaucoup d'amis et de proches et les salles de prière du vaisseau ne désemplissent pas.

languages.text: Die Crew befand sich im gnadenlosen Griff des Grauens, bis das Schiff endlich den Warp verließ. Jede Nacht forderte das lauernde Monstrum die Leben mehrerer dutzend Personen, manchmal von völlig unterschiedlichen Decks. Der Verlust ihrer Freunde und Verwandten hat die Crew völlig aufgewühlt, die Gebetsräume des Schiffs sind überfüllt.
languages.original_text: The crew remained in the grasp of terror until the vessel finally left the warp. Each night the lurking beast would claim the lives of several dozen people, sometimes from entirely different decks. The crew is distressed by the loss of their friends and relatives and the ship's prayer rooms are overcrowded.

Der Verlust ihrer Freunde und Verwandten hat die Crew völlig aufgewühlt, die Gebetsräume des Schiffs sind überfüllt.
